org.iotivity.service.resourcecontainer

Class BundleActivator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.iotivity.service.resourcecontainer.BundleActivator

  • public abstract class BundleActivator
extends java.lang.Object
    Every resource bundle has to provide a bundle activator that can be called by the resource container on bundle startup.
